attributes.action: Stop Israel sending palastinian children to prison and sentancing them in military court
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this act is illegal and imoral. Children under the age of 18 are taken away from families and subjected to torture, interrogation, physical beatings, deplorable living conditions and no access to fair trial, according to reports by human rights groups and legal observers.

According to the latest figures offered by an independent group, there are 398 Palestinian children currently inside Israeli detention centres and prisons.

Palestinian children in the Israeli prison system are not given any legal advocacy and are denied most of their rights, involved lawyers say.

we are lucky in this country that we are not subjected to these conditions but when you hear things like this it breaks your heart.

i hope that the government would take action on this petition.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
